response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its quality, innovation, and the resources invested in its development. I understand its significance to you, valued at the same amount, making it a perfect match for your requirements.

To facilitate this transaction, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time only, you can secure this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $1,150,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to the standard price, providing you with an exceptional value proposition without compromising on quality or performance.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you through the process. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
